body: Did something happen? Seems lots of change going on.
body_tagged: Did something happen? Seems lots of change going on.
title: Lots of retired / leaving mods

replies.body: The majority of them posted threads explaining why they resigned or left..
replies.body_tagged: The majority of them posted threads explaining why they resigned or left..

replies.body: we need the apps to be up pronto... not to rush but mods are dropping like flies who got poisoned...
replies.body_tagged: we need the apps to be up pronto... not to rush but mods are dropping like flies who got poisoned...

replies.body: I think that maybe people are just tired of having the responsibility of being a mod and just want to play. I agree that there have been a lot of people resigning/leaving.
replies.body_tagged: I think that maybe people are just tired of having the responsibility of being a mod and just want to play. I agree that there have been a lot of people resigning/leaving.

replies.body: The problem is, the Staff Team know each other very well. We become really great friends, however, if one of those friends leave; it's a chain reaction.
replies.body_tagged: The problem is, the Staff Team know each other very well. We become really great friends, however, if one of those friends leave; it's a chain reaction.

replies.body: They really do need to stop leaving.
replies.body_tagged: They really do need to stop leaving.

replies.body:
I don't know what you're talking about, not a single mod has left this week..
except maybe a few..
maybe a lot
